Therefore, we have designed an interdisciplinary healthcare and innovation focused program for master students in the Netherlands. 

Avicenna excellence program is focused on the interdisciplinary collaboration between master students in Medicine, Pharmacy, Innovation Sciences, Graduate school of life sciences, Economics and Law and professionals in (healthcare related) companies, NGO's and government institutes. In last year's program, students have been working on real-life health-care solutions and innovations with one of the biggest pharmaceutical companies in the world: Merck (Merck Sharp & Dohme) Pharmaceuticals. This year we had executives such as Wouter Bos (CEO VUmc), Hans de Jong (CEO Philips), Frank Mattijsen (CFO MSD), Wim Leereveld (CEO Access to medicine index) as invited speakers.
